LandingView.Free_open_source_mapping: Free and open source mapping online
LandingView.AbcMap_new_version: Abc-Map, new version 🚀 Easily create geographic maps: import, draw, visualize data, and much more!
LandingView.AbcMap_is_a_free_software: Abc-Map is a free and open source mapping software.
LandingView.Then_open_map: Then get started on the map
LandingView.Connection_is_optional: Connection is optional ! You can use Abc-Map without registering
LandingView.For_7_days_opinions_are_positive: For 7 days, {{votes}} % of opinions on Abc-Map are positive.

MapView.Visualize_and_create_in_your_browser: View, create and edit maps in your browser 🌍 ✏️

MainMap.Drop_your_files: Drop your files to import them
MainMap.You_must_select_files: You must select one or more files
MainMap.You_must_import_project_with_import_cont: You need to import your project using the 'Import Project' control
MainMap.Formats_not_supported: These file formats are not supported, no data has been imported
MainMap.Layer_does_not_load: Layer '{{name}}' is not loading correctly. Check its settings.

EditProjectModal.To_change_projection_you_must_delete_geo: To change the projection, you must remove all geometry layers and layouts.
EditProjectModal.You_can_not_use_this_projection: You can not use this projection.

ProjectControls.Sorry_this_project_is_too_heavy: Sorry 😞 this project is too big to save online. You can export it to your computer.
ProjectControls.You_must_select_a_file_with_extension_: You must select a file in {{extension}} format
ProjectControls.Password_is_mandatory: Password is required to open this project

ImportData.You_can_also_drop_on_map: You can also drop files on the map.
ImportData.Formats_not_supported: These file formats are not supported, no data has been imported

LayerControls.You_must_first_select_layer: You must first select a layer
LayerControls.Unable_to_zoom: Unable to zoom in on this layer

AddLayerModal.What_kind_of_layer: What type of layer do you want to add ?
AddLayerModal.Basemap_are_easy_to_use: Predefined basemaps allow you to quickly and easily display a world map.
AddLayerModal.Geometry_layers_allow_to_draw: Geometry layers allow you to draw shapes.
AddLayerModal.Cant_find_what_you_want: Can not find what you want ?
AddLayerModal.Cannot_use_layer: Sorry, this layer cannot be used
AddLayerModal.Cannot_get_capacities: Unable to get server capabilities, check url and credentials
AddLayerModal.WMS_are_you_sure: ⚠️  URL contains 'WMTS'. Are you sure you want to add a WMS layer ?
AddLayerModal.WMTS_are_you_sure: ⚠️  URL contains 'WMS'. Are you sure you want to add a WMTS layer ?

ToolSelector.You_must_select_geometry_layer_before: You must select a geometry layer to use the tools.

DeviceWarningModal.AbcMap_is_designed_for_desktop_computers: Abc-Map is designed to work on a desktop computer , with Firefox or Chromium browsers, and a minimum screen resolution of 1366x768 .

ModalService.Your_project_contains_credentials: Your project contains credentials, you must choose a password to protect them.
ModalService.Enter_project_password: Enter the project password to unlock it.
ModalService.Current_changes_will_be_lost: If you continue, the current changes will be lost.
ModalService.If_project_saved_ignore_this_message: If you have exported or saved your project you can ignore this message.
ModalService.You_are_about_to_import_heavy_dataset: You are about to import a large amount of data.
ModalService.AbcMap_not_yet_ready_for_heavy_dataset: Abc-Map is not yet ready to process heavy datasets, you may slow down and block your session.
ModalService.For_the_moment_prefer_small_dataset: For the moment, prefer files of less than 5 MB and layers of less than 1000 geometries . In the near future, you will be able to use more data.

FormValidationLabel.Invalid_form: Invalid form, but can't tell you why 😭
FormValidationLabel.Password_is_weak: The password must contain at least 6 characters, a capital letter, a number or a symbol.
FormValidationLabel.Password_and_confirmation_do_not_match: Password and password confirmation do not match.
FormValidationLabel.Password_and_email_must_be_different: Password and email must be different !
FormValidationLabel.You_must_confirm_account_deletion: You must confirm the deletion of your account.
FormValidationLabel.Invalid_URL: The URL must be valid and start with https:// .
FormValidationLabel.List_layers_then_select_one: List layers and then select one.
FormValidationLabel.The_name_of_the_layer_is_mandatory: The name of the layer is required.
FormValidationLabel.Join_data_field_is_mandatory: The join data field is mandatory.
FormValidationLabel.Join_geometry_field_is_mandatory: The geometry join field is mandatory.
FormValidationLabel.Max_must_be_greater_than_min: The maximum size must be greater than the minimum size.
FormValidationLabel.Symbol_type_is_mandatory: The type of symbol is required.

DataStoreView.Add_data_easily: Add compatible and selected data with one click 🛒

DataProcessingView.Select_a_module_on_left:
Select a module
in the left menu.
DataProcessingView.Visualize_data_on_map: Visualize data on your maps: proportional symbols, color gradients, and more ⚙️⚙️

DataViewer.Select_a_layer: Select a layer to view its data.
DataViewer.You_must_select_a_layer_with_data: You must select a layer that contains data

ColorGradients.Color_gradients_are_used_to_represent_re: Color gradients are used to represent relative statistical data (population density, income per inhabitant, etc.)
ColorGradients.Select_data_source_and_data_field: Select a data source and a value field. This field will be used to determine the colors. For example, a CSV workbook containing the French population by department and the densite_pop field containing the density data.
ColorGradients.Select_geometry_layer_explanation: Select a geometry layer. The geometries will be duplicated and filled with the calculated color.
ColorGradients.Select_join_field_explanation: Select a join field between the data and the geometries.
ColorGradients.Select_parameters_explanation: Then select the characteristics of the geometries to create.
ColorGradients.Data_source_contains_field_that_determin: The data source contains the field that will determine the colors of the geometries. The data source can be a map layer or a CSV format workbook.
ColorGradients.Colors_applied_to_copy_of_geometries: The colors will be applied to a copy of the geometries of the selected layer.
ColorGradients.Colors_depends_on_algorithm: The colors will be created in a new layer. Their values will be determined by the source field used, and by the type of algorithm.
ColorGradients.You_must_select_a_value_field: You must choose a value field.
ColorGradients.You_must_select_a_datasource: You must choose a data source.
ColorGradients.Nothing_has_been_processed: No geometry has been processed. Processing has been misconfigured or the data is invalid.
ColorGradients.Some_features_cannot_be_joined: ⚠️ Some geometries ({{invalidFeatures}}) do not have the {{geometryJoinBy}} join property. They have not been used.
ColorGradients.Some_colors_values_are_incorrect: ⚠️ Some values of color field ({{invalidValues}}) cannot be used as numbers.
ColorGradients.Some_geometries_does_not_have_data: ⚠️ Some geometries ({{missingDataRows}}) do not have data corresponding to their {{joinBy}} property.
ColorGradients.Processing_done_with_warnings: Processing is complete, but it did not go as expected
ColorGradients.Processing_was_interrupted_because_of_wr: Processing was interrupted because some data is incorrect
ColorGradients.Processing_interrupted_data_must_be_grea: Values must be greater than zero and the minimum value must be less than the maximum value

DataSourceForm.Select_file_on_computer: Select a file on your computer. This file must
DataSourceForm.Be_in_CSV_format: Be in CSV format: comma separator, double quotes
DataSourceForm.Have_header_row: Have a header row with the name of the columns
DataSourceForm.This_source_contains_a_lot_of_data: This source contains a lot of data ({{rows}}), processing may take a long time.

GeometryLayerForm.No_geometry_found: This layer does not contain any geometry.
